section.title: gemm or gesvd crash
section.para:
gemm
gesvd If you run a query that uses the gemm() or gesvd() operator, and it crashes, it could be because you have run out of shared memory. If this occurs, you should increase the value for the max-memory-limit parameter in your SciDB config.ini file. For details, see .
Also, you can run mpi_init() to try to clear space on the partition. For details, see .
